mapper.select: select * from userjoin where userId=#{userId} and userPw=#{userPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userjoin(userId, userPw, userName, userBirth, sex, userMobile, userEmail) VALUES(#{userId},#{userPw},#{userName},#{userBirth},#{sex},#{userMobile},#{userEmail})
mapper.update: update userjoin set userPw=#{userPw}, userName=#{userName}, userBirth=#{userBirth}, sex=#{sex}, userMobile=#{userMobile}, userEmail=#{userEmail} where userId=#{userId}
